ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Newbie project stats
ygData.msgSnippet: Hell, this has made me feel bad.  Only been playin since dec and have most of my Lambent (due to a great guild). S P O I L E R S P A C E Kill the willowisps
ygData.messageBody:
Hell, this has made me feel bad. Only been playin since dec
and have most of my Lambent (due to a great guild).
S
P
O
I
L
E
R

S
P
A
C
E


Kill the willowisps and get the Greater Lightstones.
Take them to the Gypsies in North Karanas, her
name starts with an "M". Give them to her and
she will give you a book (wizard something).
Sell the book back to her or take to Quenos and
sell for about 10PP.
PS. Book only goes in general inventory slot
so have some open. I made about 200PP
doing this between levels 11 and 14.
Teien Truescale (Raging Boars)
23 Bard Prexus

Peace
Evulia
